com.structed.models.algorithms
Interface IUpdateRule

All Known Implementing Classes:
CRF, DirectLoss, OrbitLoss, PassiveAggressive, Perceptron, ProbitLoss, RampLoss, SVM
public interface IUpdateRule

IUpdateRule interface - inorder to add new update rule in you own task you should implement this interface this interface enable us to set many update versions and compare between them
